Jestem otwart i ambitn osob. Interesuje: I am an open and ambitious person. I am interesting in many things from the Middle Ages to astronomy, through stock exchange, computer games, personal development and much more. I have visited over 50 countries and have been an athlete for years, which influenced for the shape of my brain in pursuit after achieving goals. in 2022 I graduated from school qualifying for a scholarship and now I am looking for a job where I can develop my skills and learn new technologies.
Posiadam ponad rok dowiadczenia niekomer: I have over a year of non-commercial programming experience. I have written tens of thousands of lines of code, solving countless problems along the way. I have experience in both frontend and backend development, and I am also familiar with databases. The language I want to specialize in is JavaScript because it bridges both of these aspects, and when combined with React, it offers nearly limitless possibilities. Proficient use of artificial intelligence further accelerates and facilitates my coding and code comprehension process.
